daily_activities: Explore the nightlife at Khao San Road
Take a flight to Siem Reap, Cambodia
Visit the Angkor Wat temple complex
Go hiking at the Phnom Kulen National Park
Explore the Pub Street in Siem Reap for nightlife
Go shopping at the Old Market
Take a flight to Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Go hiking at the Taman Negara National Park
Visit the Kuala Lumpur Tower for sightseeing
Enjoy dining at the Jalan Alor night market
Visit the National Museum of Malaysia
Go shopping at the Pavilion Kuala Lumpur

travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport (AMD) to major airports in South East Asia such as Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport (BKK), Singapore Changi Airport (SIN), or Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KUL), with possible layovers in cities like Mumbai or Delhi.
